pages.text: The room with a square symbol is the room where Sound Carvers make charms.$(br2) There is a table embedded with amethysts in the center of the room and an instruction on how to use it.$(br2) There are also a lot of things from the storage room, $(o)these must be ingredients.

There is a note carved on the wall, in the corner of the room. It says:$(br2)$(o) It's been two weeks since the last order, and everyone is nervous.$(br) Yesterday all lights began to darken and we have lost touch with others.$(br) Is this our end?
